name: BounceTokens
description: Allows the GM to toggle bouncing of selected tokens.  Begin bouncing with the `!bounc-start` command, optionally followed by how many seconds it should take to bounce once.  End bouncing with the `!bounce-stop` command.For instructions run either command with no tokens selected, or visit [BounceTokens ForumThread](https://app.roll20.net/forum/permalink/3973585/).
